meanings.definition: The quality of being harmful or poisonous.
meanings.sent1: The noxiousness of the fumes made everyone cough.
meanings.sent2: The noxiousness of the chemicals in the water posed a serious threat to the wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The noxiousness of the spoiled milk made the whole room smell like a rotten egg.
meanings.sent4: The noxiousness of the gossip spread through the office like a toxic cloud.
meanings.sent5: The noxiousness of the spider's venom paralyzed its prey instantly.

meanings.definition: The state of being detrimental to health or well-being.
meanings.sent1: The noxiousness of the mold in the old house caused respiratory problems for the residents.
meanings.sent2: The noxiousness of the polluted air in the city led to an increase in respiratory illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The noxiousness of the loud music at the party gave me a headache.
meanings.sent4: The noxiousness of the negative thoughts in her mind clouded her judgment.
meanings.sent5: The noxiousness of the fast food diet took a toll on his health over time.
